subject: User cannot log in to Outlook
description: John Smith reports he cannot log into his Outlook account from his laptop. Error says invalid credentials.

subject: Server CPU high on FS-01
description: Monitoring alert: FS-01 file server has sustained CPU usage above 90% for 15 minutes.

subject: Nightly backup reported as failed
description: Veeam backup job for SQL-PRD-01 failed last night. Customer wants to know if data is safe.
